titles.title: Oh, How Lovely Are Your Dwellings

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh, how lovely are Your dwellings.
My soul longs for the courts of the Lord.
Oh, how lovely are Your dwellings.
My heart sings for joy to the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
How blessed is he whose strength is in Thee,
Whose heart is a highway to Zion.
How blessed is he whose strength is in Thee,
For he shall behold Thee in Zion.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And he shall go from strength unto strength,
Beholding the Lord as his sun and shield.
And he shall go from strength unto strength,
Beholding the Lord as his glory.
